original_text: In this way, everyone will know that you are my disciples. They will know it, if you really love each other.’
korean_text: 너희가 서로 사랑하면 이로써 모든 사람이 너희가 내 제자인 줄 알리라

sentences.original_text: In this way, everyone will know
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 하면 모든 사람이 알게 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: if you really love each other
